author: aaron
msg: Fix mod_rewrite hang when APR uses SysV Semaphores. Before we were
silently failing when locking/unlocking the mutex, since httpd
child processes didn't have permissions to access the root-created

author: aaron
msg: Add unixd_set_global_mutex_perms so we can set permissions on things like
SysV Semaphores in the core and modules.

author: aaron
msg: Add some error checking in mod_rewrite for the mutex lock/unlock calls.

author: bnicholes
msg: Updated the NetWare make file to match the latest changes

author: stoddard
msg: Protect from buffer overflow when populating a HEAP based cache object.
